cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)

SET(TARGET boringssl)

SET(TARGET_ROOT "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")

SET(C_FLAGS "-fstack-protector --param=ssp-buffer-size=4 -pthread -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-missing-field-initializers -pipe -fPIC -Wno-unused-local-typedefs -Wno-format -Wno-unused-result -m64 -march=x86-64 -O0 -g -funwind-tables -gsplit-dwarf")

SET(CXX_FLAGS "${C_FLAGS} -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fno-threadsafe-statics -Wno-deprecated -Wno-narrowing -Wno-literal-suffix")

SET(SOURCES

  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/crypto/x509v3/v3_sxnet.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/crypto/x509v3/v3_utl.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/d1_both.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/d1_clnt.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/d1_lib.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/d1_meth.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/d1_pkt.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/d1_srtp.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/d1_srvr.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/pqueue/pqueue.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/s3_both.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/s3_clnt.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/s3_enc.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/s3_lib.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/s3_meth.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/s3_pkt.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/s3_srvr.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_aead_ctx.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_algs.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_asn1.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_cert.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_cipher.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_lib.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_rsa.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_sess.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_stat.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/ssl_txt.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/t1_enc.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/t1_lib.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/ssl/t1_reneg.c
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/aes/aes-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/aes/aesni-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/aes/bsaes-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/aes/vpaes-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/bn/rsaz-avx2.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/bn/rsaz-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/bn/x86_64-mont.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/bn/x86_64-mont5.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/cpu-x86_64-asm.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/md5/md5-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/modes/aesni-gcm-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/modes/ghash-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/rand/rdrand-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/rc4/rc4-md5-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/rc4/rc4-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/sha/sha1-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/sha/sha256-x86_64.S
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/sha/sha512-x86_64.S
  )

FOREACH(F ${SOURCES})
  IF(F MATCHES ".+\\.cpp$" OR F MATCHES ".+\\.cc$")
    SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(${F} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "${CXX_FLAGS}")
  ELSEIF(F MATCHES ".+\\.c$" OR F MATCHES ".+\\.S$")
    SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(${F} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "${C_FLAGS}" LANGUAGE C)
  ENDIF()
ENDFOREACH()

ADD_LIBRARY(${TARGET} STATIC ${SOURCES})

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${TARGET} PRIVATE
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/include
  ${WEBRTC_ROOT}/third_party/boringssl/src/crypto
  )

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${TARGET} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "V8_DEPRECATION_WARNINGS;_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64;CHROMIUM_BUILD;CR_CLANG_REVISION=239765-1;UI_COMPOSITOR_IMAGE_TRANSPORT;USE_AURA=1;USE_ASH=1;USE_PANGO=1;USE_CAIRO=1;USE_DEFAULT_RENDER_THEME=1;USE_LIBJPEG_TURBO=1;ENABLE_ONE_CLICK_SIGNIN;ENABLE_PRE_SYNC_BACKUP;ENABLE_REMOTING=1;ENABLE_WEBRTC=1;ENABLE_MEDIA_ROUTER=1;ENABLE_PEPPER_CDMS;ENABLE_CONFIGURATION_POLICY;ENABLE_NOTIFICATIONS;ENABLE_HIDPI=1;ENABLE_TOPCHROME_MD=1;USE_UDEV;DONT_EMBED_BUILD_METADATA;ENABLE_TASK_MANAGER=1;ENABLE_EXTENSIONS=1;ENABLE_PLUGINS=1;ENABLE_SESSION_SERVICE=1;ENABLE_AUTOFILL_DIALOG=1;ENABLE_BACKGROUND=1;CLD_VERSION=2;ENABLE_PRINTING=1;ENABLE_BASIC_PRINTING=1;ENABLE_PRINT_PREVIEW=1;ENABLE_CAPTIVE_PORTAL_DETECTION=1;ENABLE_APP_LIST=1;ENABLE_SETTINGS_APP=1;ENABLE_SUPERVISED_USERS=1;ENABLE_MDNS=1;ENABLE_SERVICE_DISCOVERY=1;V8_USE_EXTERNAL_STARTUP_DATA;FULL_SAFE_BROWSING;SAFE_BROWSING_CSD;SAFE_BROWSING_DB_LOCAL;SAFE_BROWSING_SERVICE;BORINGSSL_IMPLEMENTATION;BORINGSSL_NO_STATIC_INITIALIZER;USE_LIBPCI=1;USE_NSS_CERTS=1;DYNAMIC_ANNOTATIONS_ENABLED=1;WTF_USE_DYNAMIC_ANNOTATIONS=1;_DEBUG;_GLIBCXX_DEBUG=1")
